import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; const Experience = () => { const experiences = [ { company: "Artxtic", position: "Frontend Web Developer", period: "2023 - Present", description: [ "Built an AI SaaS platform for ecommerce product image generation", "Implemented responsive UI components with React and Tailwind CSS", "Optimized performance for high-volume image processing and rendering", "Collaborated with design team to implement pixel-perfect interfaces", "Integrated RESTful APIs and implemented state management solutions" ], skills: ["React", "JavaScript", "Tailwind CSS", "REST APIs", "Performance Optimization"], projectLink: "https://artxtic.com" }, { company: "Freelance Projects", position: "Full Stack Developer", period: "2021 - 2023", description: [ "Developed and deployed multiple web applications for various clients", "Created responsive and accessible user interfaces with modern frameworks", "Implemented backend services and database solutions", "Conducted code reviews and mentored junior developers" ], skills: ["React", "Node.js", "MongoDB", "Express", "Responsive Design"] } ]; return (
